CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: As shown in Figure 4 , solar cells , which were fabricated from PSFDTBT : PC71BM in a ratio of 1 : 3.5 ( w / w ) in DCB solutions and PSFDTBT : PC71BM in a ratio of 1 : 3 ( w / w ) in TCB solutions , both exhibited a broad photoresponse extending from 350 to 700 nm.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PSFDTBT |
| PC71BM |
| solar cells (fabricated from PSFDTBT : PC71BM in a ratio of 1 : 3.5 (w / w) in DCB solutions) |
| solar cells (fabricated from PSFDTBT : PC71BM in a ratio of 1 : 3 (w / w) in TCB solutions) |

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PSFDTBT |
| PC71BM |
| solar cells (fabricated from PSFDTBT and PC71BM with ratios of 1 : 3.5 (w / w) and 1 : 3 (w / w) respectively) |
